solidbase.core
Class SQLProcessor

java.lang.Object
  solidbase.core.CommandProcessor
      solidbase.core.SQLProcessor

public class SQLProcessor
extends CommandProcessor

This class is the coordinator. It reads commands from the SQLFile. It calls the CommandListeners, calls the Database to execute statements through JDBC, and shows progress to the user by calling ProgressListener.

Since:
May 2010
Author:
René M. de Bloois
